text: When I'm off the road, my husband and I recharge our batteries. It's a day of deep rest and connection with the spiritual, and that can be anything - going for a walk in nature, being in silence, burning incense.
author: Alanis Morissette

text: Everyone who understands the nature of God rightly necessarily knows that God is to be believed and hoped in, that he is to be loved and called upon, and to be heard in all things.
author: William Ames

text: Reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled.
author: Richard P. Feynman

text: As in nature, as in art, so in grace it is rough treatment that gives souls, as well as stones, their luster.
author: Thomas Guthrie

text: The wit makes fun of other persons the satirist makes fun of the world the humorist makes fun of himself, but in so doing, he identifies himself with people - that is, people everywhere, not for the purpose of taking them apart, but simply revealing their true nature.
author: James Thurber
